modName: M'rissi's Tails of Troubles Reqtified - DELETED
summary: A basic patch for Requiem 1.9.4 that attempts to make the follower M'rissi and her questline mesh better into the Reqtified worlspace!
descriptionHtml: A basic patch for Requiem 1.9.4 that attempts to make the follower M'rissi and her questline mesh better into the Reqtified worldspace! This is my first ever attempt at patching something, so no promises that its' perfect. I tried to level the enemies you'll be fighting around the teens. M'rissi will also level alongside you! If you have any questions, concerns, or problems, leave a comment and I'll try to get back to you! :)
author: elleoellie
